properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden.

Stunning detached four-bedroom house with a large garage and south-facing garden. Perfect for a growing family, located near top-rated schools. Features include a spacious open-plan living area, a modern kitchen with an island, and a master bedroom with an en-suite.

Modern one-bedroom apartment close to the city center. Features a balcony with city views and access to a residents' gym. Ideal for young professionals working in the city. The apartment comes fully furnished and includes a secure parking space.

Luxurious five-bedroom Victorian home. Includes a basement cinema room and a landscaped garden. This property has been recently renovated to a high standard, retaining many original features while adding modern conveniences.

Spacious two-bedroom flat in a converted warehouse. Exposed brick walls and high ceilings give this property unique character. Located in the heart of the docklands, with easy access to the river and local amenities.

Charming three-bedroom cottage with original features. Located in a quiet village setting with easy access to motorways. The property features a cozy living room with a fireplace, a country-style kitchen, and a beautiful garden.
